languages.text: "Не подвергни сомнению веру и власть, ибо сомнения порождают ересь".
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
languages.original_text: "Не подвергни сомнению веру и власть, ибо сомнения порождают ересь".

traits.locale_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."
"Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

languages.text: “不要质疑信仰与权威，因为怀疑会导致异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: “不要质疑信仰与权威，因为怀疑会导致异端邪说。”

languages.text: 「信念や権力に疑問を抱いてはいけない。疑念は異端的思想を生むのだから」
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「信念や権力に疑問を抱いてはいけない。疑念は異端的思想を生むのだから」

languages.text: «No ponga en duda la fe ni la autoridad, pues la duda engendra herejía».
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: «No ponga en duda la fe ni la autoridad, pues la duda engendra herejía».

languages.text: "Stellt den Glauben und die Autorität nicht in Frage, denn Zweifel führen zu Ketzerei."
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Stellt den Glauben und die Autorität nicht in Frage, denn Zweifel führen zu Ketzerei."

languages.text: « Ne remettez en question ni votre foi ni l'autorité, car du doute naît l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: « Ne remettez en question ni votre foi ni l'autorité, car du doute naît l'hérésie. »

languages.text: "İnancı veya otoriteyi sorgulama. Şüphe, kâfirliğin babasıdır."
languages.original_text: "Do not question faith or authority, for doubt begets heresy."

traits.locale_text: "İnancı veya otoriteyi sorgulama. Şüphe, kâfirliğin babasıdır."
